mdRecord.dcterms:title: Diary of Anne Frank by Frances Goodrich and Albert Hackett; Devil's Disciple by George Bernard Shaw; Light Up the Sky by Moss Hart
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the plays Diary of Anne Frank by Frances Goodrich and Albert Hackett, Aug 5-10 | Devil's Disciple by George Bernard Shaw, Aug 12-17 | Light Up the Sky by Moss Hart, Aug 19- Sept 7.

Virginia
